name: kubekey
description: Manage Kubernetes clusters with KubeKey: check installation, install KubeKey, create clusters, scale nodes, upgrade clusters, and view configurations.
author: hb-chen

installation.instructions:
Copy the kubekey skill folder to your skills directory:
- For Claude Code: ~/.claude/skills/ or .claude/skills/
- For OpenAI Codex CLI: ~/.codex/skills/

examples: Create a Kubernetes cluster from configuration file
Scale a cluster by adding worker nodes
